channel.title: Need help! my server is ruined :(
channel.description: How do I change .Class files from being opened by notepad instead of it being normal? :( :( :( :mad: :confused: I cannot run my server if the the .Class files can be opened with notepad :( How do I switch it back PLEASE!!!

item.title: Need help! my server is ruined :(
item.dc:creator: @ddsowns ddsowns
item.description:
@ddsowns wrote:

My classes open as notepad and it works fine. It looks serverside from the picture you posted.

item.title: Need help! my server is ruined :(
item.dc:creator: @xx_Santa_pker_xX xx Santa pker xX
item.description:
@xx_Santa_pker_xX wrote:

Didnt try icey pkz one

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Read full topic

item.title: Need help! my server is ruined :(
item.dc:creator: @Anc13nt_Arr0w Anc13nt Arr0w
item.description:
@Anc13nt_Arr0w wrote:

Class files are used for different things, leave the classfiles as they are.

If you are working with .java files, make sure you have the right JDK, otherwise your changes will not work.

Hence .cfg’s do work whatever JDK your computer is using.

Read full topic
